title: idb file and IDA
content: I've just received from a friend a *.idb file  concerning the pe file i'd like to disassemble in IDA. What the file is and how can i load/use it with the exe linked with it in IDA?

answers_data.content:
a IDB file is IDAs primary project/database format

its the result of an IDA exe load + analyze run

just open it with IDA
